articles.title: Powerful Ohio utilities regulator steps down following FBI search of his home - The Columbus Dispatch
articles.description: Ohio's top utilities regulator resigns days after the FBI search his home.
articles.content:
Mark Williams | The Columbus Dispatch
Ohio's top utilities regulator resigned Friday, capping a tumultuous week that started when the FBI searched his home and ended with a letter to Gov. Mike DeWin… [+4925 chars]
